meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ben Raphel Laura Miller Kyle Becker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7650.

td.p: Ben Raphel, a healthcare data analyst from Boston, Massachusetts
Laura Miller, an attorney from Arlington, Virginia
Kyle Becker, a research scientist from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 4-day cash winnings total $63,802)

tr.td: THE FOOD CHAIN
STATELY BODIES OF WATER
HAMMER
FROM B TO C
I SING THE BODY
ELECTRIC

LauraWho is Mariska Hargitay?
$9,599
KyleWho is ?
$3,001
BenWho is Mariska Hargitay?
$9,601
Mariska Hargitay')
